content.raw:
# Prerequisites

* [ ] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:  
       * Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org  
    X  * Checked that your issue isn't already filed.  
   N/A * Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

# Description 

I am trying to install ignition-math 6.4.0, but the build fails for me. 

# Steps to Reproduce

1. mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE\_BUILD\_TYPE=Release  
2. make

**Expected behavior:**  

The build should succeed.

**Actual behavior:**

Errors out. Build log: https://gist.github.com/acxz/b82cb035afa55339387361ba62353a9a

**Reproduces how often:** 

100%

# Versions

ArchLinux  
GCC: 9.2  
Ruby: 2.7.0

# Additional Information

Note: Downgrading to ruby 2.6.5 allows for the build to succeed.

‌

Prerequisites

  • [ ] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:
    • Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
      X * Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
      N/A * Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

Description

I am trying to install ignition-math 6.4.0, but the build fails for me.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
  2. make

Expected behavior:

The build should succeed.

Actual behavior:

Errors out. Build log: https://gist.github.com/acxz/b82cb035afa55339387361ba62353a9a

Reproduces how often:

100%

Versions

ArchLinux
GCC: 9.2
Ruby: 2.7.0

Additional Information

Note: Downgrading to ruby 2.6.5 allows for the build to succeed.
